Package PloyGame

Class PloyModerator

java.lang.Object
MARDA.Moderator
PloyGame.PloyModerator
public class PloyModerator extends Moderator
Concrete class for a moderator for Ploy in charge of reviewing the game's state to determine if a player is out, legal moves and game over conditions.

  • Method Details

    • clickedOn

      public void clickedOn(int i, int j, int numPlayers, int gameMode, Object[] players, Object board, Object gui)
      Handles the clicking of a piece in case it is not currently active. This includes checking whose turn it is, highlighting legal moves and enabling rotation buttons. In the case a piece is currently active, it handles legality of moves, capturing enemy pieces and checking the state of the game after a move.
      Specified by:
      clickedOn in class Moderator
      Parameters:
      i - location on the x axis of the board
      j - location on the y axis of the board
      numPlayers - the number of players in the game
      gameMode - the game mode being played
      players - array of players in the game
      board - current instance of the board
      gui - current instance of the gui

    • checkGameOver

      protected void checkGameOver(Object hitInfo, Object attackerInfo, int gameMode, Object[] players, Object board, Object gui)
      Checks if the game is over after a move has been made.
      Specified by:
      checkGameOver in class Moderator
      Parameters:
      hitInfo - the information of the piece that was captured
      attackerInfo - the information of the piece that made the attack
      gameMode - the game mode being played
      players - the players in the game
      board - instance of the board
      gui - instance of the gui

      protected char finished(Object gui)
